original_title: Special dengue control program initiated at A/L exam centres
original_body_lines: Special dengue control program has been initiated ahead of the upcoming 2023 G.C.E. Advanced Level Examination which is scheduled to take place from January 04 - 31.
The president of the Health Entomologists’ Association, Nijith Sumanasena said the dengue control program will be conducted at all examination centres across the country until December 31.

Meanwhile, conducting all tuition classes in preparation for the A/L Examination will be prohibited from midnight on December 29 until the end of the exam. Accordingly, conducting tuition classes, seminars, workshops, and other related activities targeting the examination will be suspended.
